definitions.text: anemic looking from illness or emotion; ; ; ; ; - Mary W. Shelley
examples: tried to speak with bloodless lips
lips...livid with the hue of death

definitions.text: (of a light) imparting a deathlike luminosity; ; - E.A.Poe
examples: a thousand flambeaux...turned all at once that deep gloom into a livid and preternatural day
willful stupidity makes him absolutely livid

definitions.text: discolored by coagulation of blood beneath the skin
